facilities: CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE facilities(id INT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY COMMENT 'Id placówki', address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, station_number INT NOT NULL COMMENT 'Liczba stanowisk naprawczych', opening_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, closing_date TIMESTAMP) ENGINE=InnoDB, CHARACTER SET=utf8mb4, COLLATE=utf8mb4_polish_ci;
employees: CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE employees(id INT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY COMMENT 'Id pracownika',name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,surname VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,birth_date DATE NOT NULL,email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,address VARCHAR(255)NOT NULL, facility_id INT UNSIGNED COMMENT 'id placówki w której pracuje', FOREIGN KEY employees(facility_id) REFERENCES facilities(id),position VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,hire_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,quit_date TIMESTAMP,salary DECIMAL(8, 2) NOT NULL) ENGINE=InnoDB, CHARACTER SET=utf8mb4, COLLATE=utf8mb4_polish_ci;
clients: CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE clients(id INT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,name  VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,surname  VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(50),phone_number VARCHAR(12),birth_date DATE NOT NULL,address VARCHAR(50),creation_date DATE NOT NULL,deletion_date DATE,last_active DATE NOT NULL) ENGINE=InnoDB, CHARACTER SET=utf8mb4, COLLATE=utf8mb4_polish_ci;
vehicles: CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE vehicles(id INT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, purchase_id INT UNSIGNED ,sale_id INT UNSIGNED) ENGINE=InnoDB, CHARACTER SET=utf8mb4, COLLATE=utf8mb4_polish_ci
payments: CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE payments (id INT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY COMMENT 'Id rozliczenia',start_date DATE NOT NULL COMMENT 'Data rozpoczęcia',end_date DATE COMMENT 'Data zakończenia',parts_cost DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Koszt części',work_cost DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Koszt pracy',description TEXT COMMENT 'description',vehicle_id INT UNSIGNED, FOREIGN KEY payments(vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(id), employee_id INT UNSIGNED, FOREIGN KEY payments(employee_id) REFERENCES employee(id),transaction_id INT UNSIGNED,  FOREIGN KEY payments(transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='Rozliczenia kosztów renowacji lub napraw';
equipment: CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE equipment(id INT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY COMMENT 'Id wyposażenia',name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Nazwa',type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Typ',number_in_stock INT NOT NULL COMMENT 'Ilość na stanie',facility_id INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT 'Id placówki',facility_id INT UNSIGNED,  FOREIGN KEY equipment(facility_id) REFERENCES facilities(id)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='Posiadane wyposażenie i części';
transactions: CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE transactions(id INT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY COMMENT 'Id transakcji', transaction_type ENUM('cash', 'card') NOT NULL,id_sender INT UNSIGNED, FOREIGN KEY transactions(id_sender)  REFERENCES clients(id) COMMENT 'Ten kto płaci',id_recipient INT UNSIGNED,  FOREIGN KEY transactions(id_recipient) REFERENCES clients(id) COMMENT 'Ten kto dostaje', date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL COMMENT 'Data rozliczenia', topic CHAR(25) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Opis transkcji(komentarz)', value DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ilość przelanych środków') ENGINE=InnoDB, CHARACTER SET=utf8mb4, COLLATE=utf8mb4_polish_ci;
complaints: CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE complaints(id INT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY COMMENT 'Id reklamacji',client_id INT UNSIGNED, FOREIGN KEY complaints(client_id) REFERENCES clients(id) COMMENT 'Klient który zgłosił', employee_id INT UNSIGNED, FOREIGN KEY complaints(employee_id) REFERENCES employees(id) COMMENT 'Pracownik który przyjął', open_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL COMMENT 'Data przyjęcia', closure_date TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'Data zamknięcia reklamacji', car_id INT UNSIGNED, FOREIGN KEY complaints(car_id) REFERENCES equipment(id) COMMENT 'Pojazd którego dotyczy',description CHAR(100) NOT NULL,cost DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Koszt który poniósł warsztat') ENGINE=InnoDB, CHARACTER SET=utf8mb4, COLLATE=utf8mb4_polish_ci;
